mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_crawler( id, crawler_name, python_pkg_id, is_default, crawler_url, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{crawlerName}, #{pythonPkgId.id}, #{isDefault}, #{crawlerUrl}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_crawler SET crawler_name = #{crawlerName}, python_pkg_id = #{pythonPkgId.id}, is_default = #{isDefault}, crawler_url = #{crawlerUrl}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
